info.title: DocuWare GmbH
info.description: Access common DocuWare features from within your flows.

post.description: Stores a new document to a file cabinet.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet to store to.

parameters.name: StoreDialogId
parameters.description: Select the store dialog to use for storing.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Specify the index data for the document.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify the contents of the file to store.

post.description: Import a new document into a document tray.

parameters.name: DocumentTray
parameters.description: Select the Document Tray to import to.

parameters.name: StoreDialogId
parameters.description: Select the store dialog to use during import.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Specify the index data for the document.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify the contents of the file to import.

post.description: Search a file cabinet for documents matching the specified criteria.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet to search.

parameters.name: SearchDialogId
parameters.description: Select the search dialog to use for searching.

get.summary: Get file cabinets and document trays
get.description: Gets a list of file cabinets and/or document trays.

parameters.name: FileCabinetType
parameters.description: Select which types you want returned.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document you want information on.

delete.description: Deletes a document from a file cabinet or document tray.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document you want to delete.

get.description: Downloads a file/section of a document stored in a file cabinet or document tray.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document with the file you want to download.

parameters.name: FileNumber
parameters.description: Specify the file number of the file you want to download.

parameters.name: DocumentFormat
parameters.description: Select the format for the downloaded document.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: Accept-Encoding

get.description: Downloads a document from a file cabinet or document tray.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document you want to download.

parameters.name: DocumentFormat
parameters.description: Select the format for the downloaded document.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: Accept-Encoding

put.description: Updates the index fields of a document.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet with the document to update.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document to update.

Name.description: Select or specify an index field.

post.description: Moves one or more documents from one file cabinet/document tray to another.

parameters.name: DestinationFileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the destination File Cabinet or Document Tray.

parameters.name: StoreDialogID
parameters.description: Select the store dialog for indexing the documents being moved.

SourceFileCabinetId.description: Select the source File Cabinet or Document Tray.

Name.description: Select or specify a field name.

KeepSource.description: Choose whether the source documents should be deleted or not.

FillIntellix.description: Choose whether intelligent indexing should be used when storing.

put.description: Places a stamp on a document.

parameters.name: FileCabinetID
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document you want to stamp.

FileNumber.description: Specify the file/section containing the page to be stamped.

PageNumber.description: Specify the page number to place the stamp on.

Layer.description: Specify the document layer to place the stamp on [1-5]

PositionX.description: [Optional] Position from the left edge of the page in mm.

PositionY.description: [Optional] Position from the upper edge of the page in mm.

StampId.description: Select or specify the stamp to be used.

Password.description: Specify the password for the stamp (if required).

get.description: Gets a list of dialogs for a file cabinet or document tray.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray to get dialogs from.

parameters.name: DialogType
parameters.description: Select the type of dialogs to return.

post.description: Appends a file/section to an existing document.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document to append to.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify the contents of the file to store.

delete.description: Deletes a file/section from an existing document.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document to delete from.

parameters.name: FileNumber
parameters.description: Specify the file number to delete.

post.description: Replaces a file/section in an existing document.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with your document.

parameters.name: DocumentID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the document with the file to replace.

parameters.name: FileNumber
parameters.description: Specify the file number to replace.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify the contents of the file to store.

get.description: Gets a list of stamps for a file cabinet or document tray.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray to get stamps from.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet or Document Tray with the desired stamp.

parameters.name: Stamp
parameters.description: Select the stamp to get its fields.

get.description: Gets a list of fields for a stamp.
Gets a list of fields for a file cabinet.

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet to get fields for.

parameters.name: FieldType
parameters.description: Select the type of fields to return.

get.description: Gets the fields for a dialog

parameters.name: FileCabinet
parameters.description: Select the File Cabinet

parameters.name: DialogId
parameters.description: Select the dialog to get the fields for.

get.description: List documents from the specified document tray.

parameters.name: DocumentTray
parameters.description: Select the Document Tray to search.
